properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 v2 v1 b1 v1 c1

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: YOU KNOW THAT I LOVE YOU newline YOU KNOW THAT I WANT TO newline KNOW YOU SO MUCH MORE newline MORE THAN I HAVE BEFORE

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: THESE WORDS ARE FROM MY HEART newline THESE WORDS ARE NOT MADE UP newline AND I WILL LIVE FOR YOU newline I AM DEVOTED TO YOU

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: KING OF MAJESTY newline I HAVE ONE DESIRE newline JUST TO BE WITH YOU MY LORD newline JUST TO BE WITH YOU MY GOD

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: JESUS YOU ARE THE SAVIOR OF MY SOUL newline AND FOREVER AND EVER I'LL GIVE MY PRAISES TO YOU
